programme.title: Rowan Atkinson
programme.short_synopsis: Sue Lawley's castaway is actor and comedian Rowan Atkinson
programme.medium_synopsis: Sue Lawley's castaway is actor and comedian Rowan Atkinson.
programme.long_synopsis:
Sue Lawley's castaway this week is the comedy actor Rowan Atkinson who features in the Blackadder saga. An episode of the series was the BBC's entry for this year's Golden Rose of Montreux Television Festival.

[Taken from the original programme material for this archive edition of Desert Island Discs] 

Favourite track: Lady Writer by Dire Straits
Book: Uncle Fred in Springtime by P G Wodehouse
Luxury: Car (to clean)

programme.title: Desert Island Discs
programme.short_synopsis: Kirsty Young invites her castaway guests to share the soundtrack of their lives.
